content: sl 2 sts drop mc sl 2 sts join cc and k to 2 sts before mc repeat these two rnds until 9 11 sts rem sl 2 sts drop cc pu mc and k to 2 sts before cc cut cc leaving a 6 tail complete hat with mc sl 2 sts drop mc pu cc and continue in helical cut mc leaving a 10 tail thread yarn onto tapestry knitting as established until hat measures 6 5 needle and thread through rem sts twice pull 8 from co for a slouchy hat continue until hat together tightly and secure end weave in ends on ws measures 8 5 10 be sure to end with a cc round block gently if desired © 2024 skacel collection increase www skacelknitting com | 22
